newsitem.title: CHINA: CHINA INT'L IRON & STEEL INV CO IN US$20 MLN LOAN.
newsitem.headline: CHINA INT'L IRON & STEEL INV CO IN US$20 MLN LOAN.

text.p: The following syndicated loan issue was announced by arranger Westdeutsche Landesbank's Hongkong branch.
BORROWER CHINA INTERNATIONAL IRON & STEEL INVESTMENT CORP
AMOUNT US$20 MLN TYPE TERM LOAN LAUNCH 12.AUG.97
REPAYMENT BULLET HOME CTRY CHINA GOV LAW HONGKONG
CO-ARRANGERS AND LEAD MANAGERS US$4 MLN 17BP ALL-IN 55
NOTES THE BORROWER IS A STATE-OWNED LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY
AND IS UNDER THE DIRECT ADMINISTRATION OF BOTH THE
MINISTRY OF METALLURGICAL INDUSTRY AND THE STATE
A LETTER OF COMFORT FROM THE MINISTRY OF METALLURGICAL
PROCEEDS WILL BE USED FOR GENERAL WORKING CAPITAL
INCLUDES FUNDING FOR THE PROCUREMENT OF EQUIPMENT AND
RAW MATERIALS FOR LAIWU IRON & STEEL COMPANY.
